perturbation.original_text: within thirty Business Days from the date of this Agreement, CNS will make an upfront payment of $225,000 to WPD

perturbation.explanation: This change extends the payment deadline to 90 business days. Delaying the payment to 90 business days can violate such regulations, potentially leading to penalties or legal action for late payment.
